text:
So I've routing for @farouq1 since the kickoff but they they played against my @MiamiHEAT. I didn't know how to feel I was inbetween. 
We got the W tho

text:
Somebody-@SHAQ, @TheJetOnTNT, @TurnerSportsEJ, anybody-educate #CharlesBarkley on @NBAonTNT on style: @farouq1 was wearing a modernized version of a traditional outfit. Per @LadeAdunbi, the fabric is ankara, popular in Nigeria and elsewhere in West Africa
https://t.co/G0FarlVbR5

entity.name: Inside the NBA
entity.description: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following each NBA telecast on TNT, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.
